name: Recover Abandoned Cart for WooCommerce
author: azexo

sections.description:
Professional solution for Recover Abandoned Carts

Plugin Demo

This is add-on for Marketing Automation by AZEXO.

Main Features

  • Guests and Registered users carts capturing
  • Carts manual monitoring and management
  • All email campaigns history for every abandoned cart (sent, open, click, unsubscribe)
  • Abandoned cart condition which can be combined with other conditions of Marketing Automation by AZEXO
  • Any logic of marketing interactions with customer (SMS, Email, Popups, Banners)
  • Wide range of products filtering conditions
  • Wide range of customer conditions
  • Wide range of customer purchases history conditions
  • Possibility for AND/OR/NOT conditions combinations (logical expressions)
  • Supported all features of Marketing Automation by AZEXO and its addons
sections.installation:
1. Upload the azh_woo_recover_abandoned _cart folder to your plugins directory (e.g. /wp-content/plugins/)
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Install Marketing Automation by AZEXO plugin
  4. Open “Automation > Carts page”
  5. Click “Edit default abandoned cart campaign” and change email template
  6. Configure CRON execution on your site with 5 minutes frequency

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the azh_woo_recover_abandoned _cart folder to your plugins directory (e.g. /wp-content/plugins/)
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Install Marketing Automation by AZEXO plugin
  4. Open “Automation > Carts page”
  5. Click “Edit default abandoned cart campaign” and change email template
  6. Configure CRON execution on your site with 5 minutes frequency
